reference.title: Ncurses 端末画面制御関数

partintro.para: ncurses (new curses) は、System V Rel 4.0(及びそれ以前)のcursesのフ リーなソフトウエアエミュレーションです。ncursesは、terminfo型式を使 用し、パッド、カラー、複数のハイライト、フォーム文字、ファンクショ ンキーマッピングをサポートします。
これらの関数を動作させるには、--with-ncursesを指定してCGIバージョンの PHPをコンパイルする必要があります。この関数は、ncursesライブラリが インストールされていることを要求します。最新のバージョンを &url.ncurses;からダウンロードし、 コンパイル、インストールして下さい。

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末の色を変更可能かどうか確認する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_can_change_color
&warn.experimental.func;
The function ncurses_can_change_color returns &true; or &false;, depending on whether the terminal has color capabilities and whether the programmer can change the colors.

refnamediv.refpurpose: 入力のバッファリングを変更する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_cbreak
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_cbreak disables line buffering and character processing (interrupt and flow control characters are unaffected), making characters typed by the user immediately available to the program.
ncurses_cbreak returns &true; if any error occured, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_nocbreak

refnamediv.refpurpose: スクリーンをクリアする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_clear
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_clear clears the screen completely without setting blanks. Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
Note: ncurses_clear clears the screen without setting blanks, which have the current background rendition. To clear screen with blanks, use ncurses_erase.
See also: ncurses_erase

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレント位置から最下部までスクリーンをクリアする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_clrtobot
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_clrtobot erases all lines from cursor to end of screen and creates blanks. Blanks created by ncurses_clrtobot have the current background rendition. Returns &true; if any error occured, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_clear, ncurses_clrtoeol

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレント位置から行末までスクリーンをクリアする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_clrtoeol
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_clrtoeol erases the current line from cursor position to the end. Blanks created by ncurses_clrtoeol have the current background rendition. Returns &true; if any error occured, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_clear, ncurses_clrtobot

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末(プログラム)モードを保存する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_def_prog_mode
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_def_prog_mode saves the current terminal modes for program (in curses) for use by ncurses_reset_prog_mode. Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
See also: ncurses_reset_prog_mode

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末(シェル)モードを保存する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_def_shell_mode
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_def_shell_mode saves the current terminal modes for shell (not in curses) for use by ncurses_reset_shell_mode. Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
See also: ncurses_reset_shell_mode

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレント位置の文字を削除し、残った部分を左に移動する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_delch
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_delch deletes the character under the cursor. All characters to the right of the cursor on the same line are moved to the left one position and the last character on the line is filled with a blank. The cursor position does not change. Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
See also: ncurses_deleteln

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレント位置の行を削除し、残りの部分を上に上げる

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_deleteln
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_deleteln deletes the current line under cursorposition. All lines below the current line are moved up one line. The bottom line of window is cleared. Cursor position does not change. Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
See also: ncurses_delch

refnamediv.refpurpose: 準備中の全ての出力を書き込み、端末をリフレッシュする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_doupdate
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_doupdate() compares the virtual screen to the physical screen and updates the physical screen. This way is more effective than using multiple refresh calls. Returns &false; on success, &true; if any error occured.

refnamediv.refpurpose: キーボード入力のエコーを有効とする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_echo
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_echo enables echo mode. All characters typed by user are echoed by ncurses_getch. Returns &false; on success, &true; if any error occured.
To disable echo mode use ncurses_noecho.

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末画面を消去する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_erase
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_erase fills the terminal screen with blanks. Created blanks have the current background rendition, set by ncurses_bkgd. Returns &false; on success, &true; if any error occured.
See also: ncurses_bkgd, ncurses_clear

refnamediv.refpurpose: 消去されたカレントの文字を返す

refentry.refsect1:
説明
stringncurses_erasechar
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_erasechar returns the current erase char character.
See also: ncurses_killchar

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末画面をフラッシュする(ビジュアルベル)

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_flash
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_flash flashes the screen, and if its not possible, sends an audible alert (bell). Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
See also: ncurses_beep

refnamediv.refpurpose: キーボード入力バッファをフラッシュする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_flushinp
&warn.experimental.func;
The ncurses_flushinp throws away any typeahead that has been typed and has not yet been read by your program. Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.

refnamediv.refpurpose: カラー端末かどうか確認する
挿入/削除機能の有無を確認する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_has_ic
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_has_ic checks terminals insert- and delete capabilitites. It returns &true; when terminal has insert/delete-capabilities, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_has_il

refnamediv.refpurpose: 行挿入/削除機能の有無を確認する
カレント位置の文字と属性を取得する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
stringncurses_inch
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_inch returns the character from the current position.

refnamediv.refpurpose: 行を挿入し、残りの部分をスクロールダウンする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_insertln
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_insertln inserts a new line above the current line. The bottom line will be lost.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Ncursesがendwinモードの場合、通常の画面出力が実行可能

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_isendwin
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_isendwin returns &true;, if ncurses_endwin has been called without any subsequent calls to ncurses_wrefresh, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_endwin ncurses_wrefresh()

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレントの行削除文字を返す

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_killchar
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_killchar returns the current line kill character.
See also: ncurses_erasechar

refnamediv.refpurpose: 改行を復改/ラインフィードに変換

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_nl
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末をcookedモードに変更する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_nocbreak
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_nocbreak routine returns terminal to normal (cooked) mode. Initially the terminal may or may not in cbreak mode as the mode is inherited. Therefore a program should call ncurses_cbreak and ncurses_nocbreak explicitly. Returns &true; if any error occured, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_cbreak

refnamediv.refpurpose: キーボード入力エコーを無効にする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_noecho
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_noecho prevents echoing of user typed characters. Returns &true; if any error occured, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_echo, ncurses_getch

refnamediv.refpurpose: 改行を復改/ラインフィードに変換しない

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_nonl
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末をrawモード以外に変更する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_noraw
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_noraw switches the terminal out of raw mode. Raw mode is similar to cbreak mode, in that characters typed are immediately passed through to the user program. The differences that are that in raw mode, the interrupt, quit, suspend and flow control characters are all passed through uninterpreted, instead of generating a signal. Returns &true; if any error occured, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_raw, ncurses_cbreak, ncurses_nocbreak

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末をrawモードに変更する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_raw
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_raw places the terminal in raw mode. Raw mode is similar to cbreak mode, in that characters typed are immediately passed through to the user program. The differences that are that in raw mode, the interrupt, quit, suspend and flow control characters are all passed through uninterpreted, instead of generating a signal. Returns &true; if any error occured, otherwise &false;.
See also: ncurses_noraw, ncurses_cbreak, ncurses_nocbreak

refnamediv.refpurpose: 保存した端末モードに復帰する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_resetty
&warn.experimental.func;
Function ncurses_resetty restores the terminal state, which was previously saved by calling ncurses_savetty. This function always returns &false;.
See also: ncurses_savetty

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末の状態を保存する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_savetty
&warn.experimental.func;
Function ncurses_savetty saves the current terminal state. The saved terminal state can be restored with function ncurses_resetty. ncurses_savetty always returns &false;.
See also: ncurses_resetty

refnamediv.refpurpose: ソフトラベルキー関数を初期化する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_slk_init intformat
&warn.experimental.func;
Funtion ncurses_slk_init must be called before ncurses_initscr or ncurses_newterm is called. If ncurses_initscr eventually uses a line from stdscr to emulate the soft labels, then format determines how the labels are arranged of the screen. Setting format to 0 indicates a 3-2-3 arrangement of the labels, 1 indicates a 4-4 arrangement and 2 indicates the PC like 4-4-4 mode, but in addition an index line will be created.

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレントのソフトラベルキー属性を返す

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_slk_attr
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_slk_attr returns the current soft label key attribute. On error returns &true;, otherwise &false;.

refnamediv.refpurpose: 画面からソフトラベルをクリアする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_slk_clear
&warn.experimental.func;
The function ncurses_slk_clear clears soft label keys from screen. Returns &true; on error, otherwise &false;.

refnamediv.refpurpose: 仮想画面にソフトラベルキーをコピーする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_slk_noutrefresh
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: ソフトラベルキーを画面にコピーする
ソフトラベルキーを復帰する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_slk_restore
&warn.experimental.func;
The function ncurses_slk_restore restores the soft label keys after ncurses_slk_clear has been performed.

refnamediv.refpurpose: ncurses_slk_noutrefreshを実行する際に強制的に出力する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_slk_touch
&warn.experimental.func;
The ncurses_slk_touch function forces all the soft labels to be output the next time a ncurses_slk_noutrefresh is performed.

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末でサポートされる全ての属性フラグの論理和を返す

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_termattrs
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末のデフォルト色をカラーID -1に割り付ける

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_use_default_colors
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレント位置に文字を追加し、カーソルを進める

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_addch intch
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレント位置に指定した長さの属性付きの文字列を追加する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_addchnstr strings intn
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレントの位置に属性付きの文字列を追加する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_addchstr strings
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレントの位置に指定した長さの文字列を追加する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_addnstr strings intn
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: カレント位置にテキストを出力する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_addstr stringtext
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: カラー0のデフォルト色を定義する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_assume_default_colors intfg intbg
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 指定した属性を無効とする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_attroff intattributes
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 指定した属性を有効にする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_attron intattributes
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 指定した属性を設定する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_attrset intattributes
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末のボーレートを返す

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_baudrate
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末のビープを鳴らす

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_beep
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_beep sends an audlible alert (bell) and if its not possible flashes the screen. Returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
See also: ncurses_flash

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末画面の背景属性を設定する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_bkgd intattrchar
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 属性付きの文字で画面周囲に境界を描画する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_border intleft intright inttop intbottom inttl_corner inttr_corner intbl_corner intbr_corner
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: 前景/背景色を設定する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_color_set intpair
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: カーソル状態を設定する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_curs_set intvisibility
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: キーコードを定義する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_define_key stringdefinition intkeycode

refentry.refsect1:

intncurses_delay_output intmilliseconds

intncurses_delwin resourcewindow
&warn.experimental.func;

refentry.refsect1:

intncurses_echochar intcharacter
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

refnamediv.refpurpose: ncursesを終了し、画面を消去する

refentry.refsect1:

intncurses_end
&warn.experimental.func;

intncurses_filter
&warn.experimental.func;

intncurses_getch

intncurses_has_key intkeycode

intncurses_init
&warn.experimental.func;

refentry.refsect1:

undocumented

refentry.refsect1:

intncurses_init_pair intpair intfg intbg

intncurses_insch intcharacter

intncurses_insstr stringtext

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末画面から文字列を読み込む

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_instr stringbuffer
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_instr returns the number of charaters read from the current character position until end of line. buffer contains the characters. Atrributes are stripped from the characters.

&warn.experimental.func;

説明
intncurses_mouseinterval intmilliseconds

intncurses_mvaddch inty intx intc

intncurses_mvaddchstr inty intx strings
&warn.experimental.func;

intncurses_mvaddnstr inty intx strings intn

intncurses_mvaddstr inty intx strings

intncurses_mvcur intold_y intold_x intnew_y intnew_x

intncurses_newwin introws intcols inty intx

refnamediv.refpurpose: シグナル文字のフラッシュを無効とする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_noqiflush
&warn.experimental.func;
undocumented

説明
intncurses_putp stringtext
&warn.experimental.func;

refnamediv.refpurpose: シグナル文字のフラッシュを有効とする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_qiflush
&warn.experimental.func;

refnamediv.refpurpose: 画面をリフレッシュする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_refresh intch
&warn.experimental.func;

refnamediv.refpurpose: 画面の内容をファイルにダンプする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_scr_dump stringfilename
&warn.experimental.func;

refnamediv.refpurpose: ファイルダンプから画面を初期化する

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末の(簡略)-名を返す

refentry.refsect1:
説明
stringncurses_termname
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_termname returns terminals shortname. The shortname is truncated to 14 characters. On error ncurses_termname returns NULL.
See also: ncurses_longname

refnamediv.refpurpose: 端末の説明を返す

refentry.refsect1:
説明
stringncurses_longname
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_longname returns a verbose description of the terminal. The descritpion is truncated to 128 characters. On Error ncurses_longname returns NULL.
See also: ncurses_termname

refnamediv.refpurpose: マウスオプションを設定する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
intncurses_mousemask intnewmask intoldmask
&warn.experimental.func;
Function ncurses_mousemask will set mouse events to be reported. By default no mouse events will be reported. The function ncurses_mousemask will return a mask to indicated which of the in parameter newmask specified mouse events can be reported. On complete failure, it returns 0. In parameter oldmask, which is passed by reference ncurses_mousemask returns the previous value of mouse event mask.
Mouse events are represented bei NCURSES_KEY_MOUSE in the ncurses_wgetch input stream. To read the event data and pop the event of of queue, call ncurses_getmouse.
As a side effect, setting a zero mousemask in newmask turns off the mouse pointer. Setting a non zero value turns mouse pointer on.
mouse mask options can be set with the following predefined constants:
NCURSES_BUTTON1_PRESSED
NCURSES_BUTTON1_RELEASED
NCURSES_BUTTON1_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON1_DOUBLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON1_TRIPLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON2_PRESSED
NCURSES_BUTTON2_RELEASED
NCURSES_BUTTON2_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON2_DOUBLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON2_TRIPLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON3_PRESSED
NCURSES_BUTTON3_RELEASED
NCURSES_BUTTON3_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON3_DOUBLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON3_TRIPLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON4_PRESSED
NCURSES_BUTTON4_RELEASED
NCURSES_BUTTON4_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON4_DOUBLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON4_TRIPLE_CLICKED
NCURSES_BUTTON_SHIFT>
NCURSES_BUTTON_CTRL
NCURSES_BUTTON_ALT
NCURSES_ALL_MOUSE_EVENTS
NCURSES_REPORT_MOUSE_POSITION
See also: ncurses_getmouse, ncurses_ungetmouse ncurese_getch
ncurses_mousemask example
$newmask = NCURSES_BUTTON1_CLICKED + NCURSES_BUTTON1_RELEASED; $mask = ncurses_mousemask($newmask, &$oldmask); if ($mask & $newmask){ printf ("All specified mouse options will be supported\n"); }

refnamediv.refpurpose: マウスイベントを読みこむ

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_getmouse arraymevent
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_getmouse reads mouse event out of queue. Function ncurses_getmouse will return ;&false; if a mouse event is actually visible in the given window, otherwise it will return &true;. Event options will be delivered in parameter mevent, which has to be an array, passed by reference (see example below). On success an associative array with following keys will be delivered:
"id" : Id to distinguish multiple devices
"x" : screen relative x-position in character cells
"y" : screen relative y-position in character cells
"z" : currently not supported
"mmask" : Mouse action
ncurses_getmouse example
switch (ncurses_getch){ case NCURSES_KEY_MOUSE: if (!ncurses_getmouse(&$mevent)){ if ($mevent["mmask"] & NCURSES_MOUSE_BUTTON1_PRESSED){ $mouse_x = $mevent["x"]; // Save mouse position $mouse_y = $mevent["y"]; } } break;
default: .... }
See also: ncurses_ungetmouse

refnamediv.refpurpose: マウスイベントをキーにプッシュする

refentry.refsect1:
説明
boolncurses_ungetmouse arraymevent
&warn.experimental.func;
ncurses_getmouse pushes a KEY_MOUSE event onto the unput queue and associates with this event the given state sata and screen-relative character cell coordinates, specified in mevent.
Event options will be specified in associative array mevent:
"id" : Id to distinguish multiple devices
"x" : screen relative x-position in character cells
"y" : screen relative y-position in character cells
"z" : currently not supported
"mmask" : Mouse action
ncurses_ungetmouse returns &false; on success, otherwise &true;.
See also: ncurses_getmouse
